name: Senna Oaks Spaceship Trip Postjam
description:
Postjam version of the GMTK Game Jam 2020 gem senna-oaks-spaceship-trip.

New features are added and the game is now finishable with 2 possible endings.
Steep learning curve with very rewarding gameplay. Start slow and develope a strategic to master the course.

--- Objective --- 
Fly Senna Oaks damaged spaceship while the controls are gradually failing (no rng!) .

--- Controls ---
 Use the on-screen inputs to steer, roll, flip your ship as well as shooting your cannons for propulsions.

--- About ---
Made by NekuSoul and Glimmer
Music by circletone
